      • insertDice

        public void insertDice​(int line,
                       int indexDraftpool,
                       int indexOfTheDiceInHand)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        return exception can't inset dice
        Parameters:
        line - of the cell of the playerWindowPattern
        indexDraftpool - of the cell of the playerWindowPattern
        indexOfTheDiceInHand - to insert in the WindowsPattern return exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertDice

        public void insertDice​(int line,
                       int indexDraftpool,
                       int indexOfTheDiceInHand,
                       boolean adjacentRestriction,
                       boolean colorRestriction,
                       boolean valueRestriction)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        line - index [0,3] of the WindowsPattern
        indexDraftpool - index [0,4] of the WindowsPattern
        indexOfTheDiceInHand - to insert in the WindowsPattern
        colorRestriction - true if the Restriction need to be respected, false if it is ignored: colorRestriction->the dice respect the restriction, == !valueRestriction || respect the restriction if this logic produce true can insert the dice
        valueRestriction - true if the Restriction need to be respected, false if it is ignored: valueRestriction->the dice respect the restriction, == !valueRestriction || respect the restriction if this logic produce true can insert the dice
        adjacentRestriction - true if the Restriction need to be respected, false if the Restriction need to be violated adjacentRestriction==the dice respect the restriction if this logic produce true can insert the dice
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • canUseToolCard

        public boolean canUseToolCard​(int cost)
        Parameters:
        cost - of the ToolCard
        Returns:
        boolean true can use the ToolCard !HasUsedDice && favorToken>=0 both true for return true
